synopsis.text: Dallyeola Hani returns in this sequel, presenting the adventures of Hany, a lively and somewhat mischievous tomboy. Living independently, Hany navigates her teenage years with a carefree spirit, as her father's work in the Middle East keeps him away and she has been without her mother since her early childhood. Hany's one remarkable talent is her incredible speed, making her an exceptional runner. Join Hany as she embraces life with her unique charm and swiftness. (Source: Cute in Korea)
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
